txt.en: 'Grimbold...my old friend....'
'Is the Ford...is it....'
'Good.'
'We need...need to keep....'

'You are [placeholder]? Grimbold spoke to me of you. He says you fought bravely today.'

Elfhelm looks across the waters of the Isen into the distance.

'Many men fought bravely today. For many a man this was his last battle.'

'Prince Théodred's wounds are grievous, [placeholder]. He does not have much time left. I have given him a bedroll and tried to make him as comfortable as I can, but....'

He shakes his head, a haunted look in his eyes.

'I am a veteran of many wars, [placeholder], and have seen death in all its forms, but to see Théoden King's heir like this...more than my Prince will die tonight. I fear Rohan dies with him.'
'[placeholder]....'
'Elfhelm...I thought I saw...your shield....'
'Prince Théodred is dead. We will bury him here, as was his wish, alongside his men. They will not return to Rohan, but will keep the Ford alongside their Prince until the end of all days.'
'He needs...allies...if Rohan is to...survive....'
'You did, my Prince. I rode down the great Orc that gave you that wound.'

'I want you... to know...'

Théodred coughs weakly. He is clearly near the end of his strength.

'My father... cannot stand... alone...'

He closes his eyes for a moment, but keeps speaking.

'My father... the King...'
'No!'
'Courage....'
'I am ready for this day to be done, [placeholder]. I know it is the same with you.'
'Leave me...here....'
'Cynstan...where is....'
'I will...keep the Ford....'
'Grimbold...I am not...a child....'
'Éomer....'
The unthinkable has happened: Théodred, the Prince of Rohan, has sustained a mortal wound and lies dying at the Ford of Isen.
'We will stand by him!'
'[placeholder].'
'Aye, we are sworn to the King!'
'My Prince! I am here!'
'We still hold the Ford, my Prince. The Uruks have retreated to Isengard.'
Listen to Elfhelm
'You need your rest, my Prince. We will speak of Cynstan another time....'
Talk to Elfhelm
'Cynstan fell defending you from the Orcs, my Prince. He was very brave.'
Do what you can for Théodred
'You will be with him, my Prince. We will bring you to Edoras.'
'I rode hard from Helm's Deep once Saruman's forces were spotted.'
Talk to Grimbold
'Would that we got here sooner.'
Listen to Théodred
'Grimbold is with the Prince. You should go to him.'
Talk to Théodred
Talk to Grimbold
'We will hold the Ford. Saruman cannot break us, Prince Théodred.'
'His courage deserted him, and I planted my spear in his back.'
Sigward
'He will have them. All of us will aid Théoden King.'
Elfhelm wishes to speak with you now that the battle has been won.
Grimbold is on the eyot in the middle of the Isen, with Théodred.
Théodred does not have much time left. He wants to speak to you.
Prince Théodred is dead. Grimbold wants to speak with you.
'I am sorry, Cynstan. We should not have hidden your bracer from you.'
'You were so young and not yet tested in battle. We meant no harm by it.'
'But you were braver than I, who has seen countless battles!'
'You stood between our Prince and his foes until you could stand no longer.'
'A man of Rohan can do no more than that.'
'I will see your bracer returned to you, Cynstan.'
'We thought you were not our equal, and we were right.'
'You were the best of us.'
'Do not think ill of us, my brother, my friend.'
Instance: The Prince of Rohan, Night
